active_posts.title: Full Disclosure: CVE-2023-40231 / CVE-2023-40232 / CVE-2023-40233 / CVE-2023-40234 "All your mempool are belong to us"
active_posts.summary:
- A new attack, replacement cycling, threatens funds in lightning channels.
- Major lightning networks implemented mitigations against this HTLC-related security risk.
- Bitcoin applications should enhance security to defend against replacement cycling disruptions.

active_posts.title: [Mempool spam] Should we as developers reject non-standard Taproot transactions from full nodes?
active_posts.summary:
- The Bitcoin network faces congestion from high volumes of BRC-20 sidelining real transactions.
- Proposed solutions include implementing BIPs and modifying Bitcoin Core to address BIP 342 issues.
- Options like pruning non-standard Taproot transactions are debated to prevent future congestion.

active_posts.title: OP_Expire and Coinbase-Like Behavior: Making HTLCs Safer by Letting Transactions Expire Safely
active_posts.summary:
- HTLC-preimage path's spendability post-timeout is questioned; urgency for spending prior is suggested.
- The sender proposes OP_Expire and Coinbase Bit soft-fork for transaction expiry post-100 blocks.
- OP_Expire would fail transactions if certain conditions, like unset Coinbase Bit, aren't met.

active_posts.title: Full Disclosure: CVE-2023-40231 / CVE-2023-40232 / CVE-2023-40233 / CVE-2023-40234 "All your mempool are belong to us"
active_posts.summary:
- A new jamming attack threatens lightning channels by disrupting HTLC traffic.
- Major lightning networks now employ measures against the higher-fee transaction replacements.
- Extended research is urged to bolster security against malleability pinning attacks.

active_posts.title: OP_Expire and Coinbase-Like Behavior: Making HTLCs Safer by Letting Transactions Expire Safely
active_posts.summary:
- The sender proposes using the OP_Expire and Coinbase Bit soft-fork to address HTLC issues.
- Implementing a coinbase-like txout handling would ensure transactions remain safe after reorgs.
- HTLCs would use OP_Expire to enforce deadlines, reverting control if the preimage isn't timely mined.

active_posts.title: LN Summit 2024 Organization
active_posts.summary:
- Antoine Riard proposes organizing the LN Summit in Africa for June 2024.
- He cites cultural richness and financial fragmentation as key reasons for the choice.
- Feedback and participation are welcomed for a transparent and fair organization process.
